entry.title: Should DevTools teach the CSS cascade?
entry.summary: Stefan Judis, two days before I mouthed off about using (X, X, X, X) for talking about specificity, has a great blog post not only using that format, but advocating that browser DevTools should show us that value by â€¦ The post Should DevTools teach the CSS cascade? appeared first on CSS-Tricks. You can support CSS-Tricks by being an MVP Supporter.
